item.title: Error When compiling
item.dc:creator: @Morgan_Linder Morgan Linder
item.description:
@Morgan_Linder wrote:

Okay im adding new hit points bar to my server, and when i changed the spirtes destination or what ever and compile it gives me these errors…

[code].\src\client.java:1861: error: illegal escape character
HPBarFull = new Sprite(s
ign.signlink.findcachedir() + “\Sprites\HITPOINTS_0.PNG”, HpPercent, 7);

                            ^

.\src\client.java:1861: error: illegal escape character
HPBarFull = new Sprite(s
ign.signlink.findcachedir() + “\Sprites\HITPOINTS_0.PNG”, HpPercent, 7);

                                    ^

2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Read full topic
